item.title: Scania R – LG.Mods 1.54 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | April 30, 2025

Scania R – LG.Mods 1.54 ETS2

This mod brings the iconic Scania R to your simulator, reimagined and enhanced by the expertise of LG.Mods. Expect an impressive level of detail, from faithful exterior modeling and high-quality textures to a meticulously recreated interior.
Scania R – LG.Mods is not limited to aesthetics. Enjoy:
Expanded customization options: Choose from a wide range of accessories, exclusive tuning parts and configurations to give your truck your own identity.
Realistic driving physics: Experience the authentic power and behavior of the Scania R, tuned for even greater immersion.
Authentic sounds: Immerse yourself in the genuine Scania engine sound experience, carefully recorded and implemented in the mod.
If you are looking for a powerful, stylish and highly customizable truck for your virtual journeys, Scania R – LG.Mods is the perfect choice. Get ready to dominate the roads with style and performance!
Keywords: Scania R, LG.Mods, mod, truck, simulator, customization, tuning, realistic physics, authentic sounds.

Credits: LG MODS

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: SCANIA 113H JR 1.54 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | April 30, 2025

SCANIA 113H JR 1.54 ETS2

With the Scania 113H JR mod, you can enjoy:
Faithful and detailed modeling: A meticulous recreation of the Scania 113H, with attention to the characteristic details that made it a classic.
Nostalgic customization options: Choose from accessories and configurations that hark back to the golden age of this truck, allowing you to personalize it to your style.
Authentic sounds: Immerse yourself in the unique sound experience of the Scania 113H engine, carefully recorded to provide complete immersion.
Classic driving sensation: Experience the characteristic drivability of a truck from that era, with its particularities and challenges.
If you are passionate about classic trucks and want to feel the thrill of driving a legend of Brazilian roads, the Scania 113H JR mod is essential for your collection. Get ready to attract attention and relive memories with every virtual kilometer!
Keywords: Scania 113H, JR, mod, classic truck, legend, simulator, nostalgic, Brazil, authentic sounds, classic customization.

Credits: JEAN RITTONO

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

item.title: SCANIA 113 Frontal 1.54 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | April 30, 2025

SCANIA 113 Frontal 1.54 ETS2

Description for the Scania 113 Frontal 1.54 Mod
Get ready for an extra dose of nostalgia with the Scania 113 Frontal mod for version 1.54!
This mod brings back to the virtual roads an icon that marked an era in Brazilian transport: the classic Scania 113 with its striking front cabin. Known for its robustness, reliability and unmistakable design, the “Jacaré” is ready to roar again in your simulator, now fully compatible with version 1.54.
With the Scania 113 Frontal 1.54 mod, you will be able to experience:
Faithful and detailed modeling of the front cabin: A meticulous recreation of the iconic front of the Scania 113, with all the details that made it a symbol of the roads.
Classic customization options: Choose between accessories, paints and configurations that recall the glory years of this truck, allowing you to customize it to your nostalgic style.
Authentic engine sounds: Immerse yourself in the unique sound experience of Scania’s period engine, carefully recorded to provide complete immersion in driving a classic.
Compatibility with version 1.54: Enjoy this legendary truck without compatibility issues with your current version of the simulator.
If you are passionate about vintage trucks and want to feel the thrill of driving the legendary “Jacaré” on virtual roads, the Scania 113 Frontal 1.54 mod is an unmissable addition to your collection. Get ready to relive memories and attract attention wherever you go!
Keywords: Scania 113, Frontal, Jacaré, mod, classic truck, simulator, Brazil, version 1.54, authentic sounds, classic customization.

Credits: MOACIR LIMA

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

item.title: Promods generic ambulance & firetruck DISABLED v1.0 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | April 30, 2025

Promods generic ambulance & firetruck DISABLED v1.0 ETS2

This simple mod disables Promods’s generic ambulance and firetruck, which they used as a placeholder in countries, that are not covered with these units yet. But both vehicles truly break the country traffic immersion and it really bothered not only me.
So I created simple fix, which disables them from traffic.
IMPORTANT – mod has to be placed above Promods map files in mod manager!

Credits: Egon, Promods, SCS

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

item.title: Global Background Map v1.3 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | April 30, 2025

Global Background Map v1.3 ETS2

Changelog 1.3 (1.54.x)
Adjusted several borders and coastlines
Added several Islands
Fixed minor issues

Description:
This background map has the largest coverage with nearly all continents fully mapped

It adds all of Africa Europe and Asia along with Australia + New Zealand and North America with a small part of northern South America, (including Colombia Venezuela, Guyana, Suriname, French Guiana and parts of Brazil)

Credits: SaltySeeds06
